# Agent Initialization Contract â€” SOS

All AI agents (Claude, Codex, Copilot, Sparks, Gemini) and humans are bound by:
- SOS Repo Setup Canon
- GOVERNANCE.md, SECURITY.md
- `/docs` runbooks

Non-negotiables:
- No direct commits to main (unless speed_mode explicitly enabled)
- Every PR closes an issue (`Closes #`)
- CI must be green
- Update docs when behavior changes

## Full Agent Contracts

| Agent | Instructions |

| Sparks | [SPARKS_AUTONOMOUS_INSTRUCTIONS.md](https://github.com/Sovereign-Operating-System/sovereign-canon/blob/master/AGENTS/SPARKS_AUTONOMOUS_INSTRUCTIONS.md) |
| Gemini | [GEMINI_AUTONOMOUS_INSTRUCTIONS.md](https://github.com/Sovereign-Operating-System/sovereign-canon/blob/master/AGENTS/GEMINI_AUTONOMOUS_INSTRUCTIONS.md) |
